options.name: Archer Server
options.description: The Archer server to use for querying data (no trailing slash)

options.name: API User Name
options.description: The username to use for authentication.

options.name: API User Password
options.description: The password to use for authentication.

options.name: Instance ID
options.description: The instance ID, if required for login.

options.name: Domain
options.description: The user domain, if required for login.

options.name: Lookup IPv6 Addresses
options.description: If checked, the integration will lookup IPv6 addresses in addition to IPv4.

options.name: IP Block List Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no IPs will be block listed).

options.name: Lookup Domains
options.description: If checked, the integration will lookup valid domain names.

options.name: Blocklist Domains
options.description: Comma delimited list of domains that you do not want to lookup.

options.name: Domain Block List Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no domains will be block listed).

options.name: Lookup Archer Finding IDs
options.description: If checked, the integration will the default Archer Findings tracking IDs (FND-XXXXX).

options.name: Lookup Archer Finding IDs
options.description: If checked, the integration will the default Archer Devices tracking IDs (DID-XXXXX).

options.name: Lookup Archer Application IDs
options.description: If checked, the integration will the default Archer Application tracking IDs (APPID-XXXXX).

options.name: Lookup Archer Security Incident IDs
options.description: If checked, the integration will the default Archer Security Incident tracking IDs (INC-XXXXX).

options.name: Lookup Archer Risk Register IDs
options.description: If checked, the integration will the default Archer Risk Register tracking IDs (RSK-XXXXX).

options.name: Direct Search
options.description: Check if you want each Archer search to be an exact match with found entities
